name: hyfo Easy Start
body:
## Welcome 

to hyfo easy start, hyfo is an R package which can be used as a tool for hydrological and forecasting. There are several tools in R including data processing and data visualization. For hydrological and hydraulic modellers, hyfo can be a good preprocessing and postprocessing tool for you.

hyfo has been tested stable on windows platform.

Detailed **user manual** can be found as following:

pdf version [here](http://media.wix.com/ugd/199c69_e653147ef331452fa7d23f959e65bf0d.pdf), well, which I recommend because it looks more colorful.

html version [here](http://rpubs.com/rankthefirst/hyfo) 
You directly download from the link above, and install in an R IDE e.g. Rstudio. **Or** use the

Simplest way to install the latest version.
```{r, results='hide'}
  install.packages('devtools')
  # Ignore the warning that Rtool is not installed, unless you want other function from devtools.
  # If "devtools" is already installed in your computer, you can directly run the following code.
  devtools::install_github('Yuanchao-Xu/hyfo')
```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
